subject: Simsonn Pedals Plus X shipping and questions
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to enquire about Simsonn Pedals Plus X 2 pedal set (Throttle/Break) with base plate shipping to my country: Jordan.

1. How much will shipping cost to Jordan?
2. Is customs handled by the carrier and what about customs cost?
3. Estimated shipping time?

4. Also will the baseplate be able to be mounted on a PXN-A10 wheel stand?

Thank you.
